The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the crew are found in an area with spikes with feeding tubes going all over the place and several skeletons and bodies, including two of the members of the original crew of the vehicle who found this place. Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie is pale by comparison to My Life as a Zucchini.
My Life as a Zucchini is a movie with beautiful drawings by a pretty traditional plot. Brother's relationship between siblings, hate between siblings are the main theme here. But this movie has found a way to revisit the story and provides a different look
